channel.title: Tobias's Final Server! (development team)
channel.description:
[b]Yes you read correctly :) , this is my last server... ever! I might still come on moparscape from time to time to help people with their errors as I have been doing for the past few months. So I decided if im going to leave, I might as well make one final server. If ive ever helped you or you know me or you would simply like to help with my last server, please join! The name has not been decided yet, but hopefully we will think of one soon![/b] [center][b]You may think "CLASS! Tobias's final server, its gonna be great, too bad he wont want me in the team >.<" Thats not true, no matter how skilled you are I want you. Please dont think that. I want this to be a community project. not a "people good at servers only" project. I will enjoy leaving mopar knowing I taught at least a few people while developing my last server. I thought it was important for you to know this.[/b][/center] [center][u]How I plan to talk to everyone:[/u][/center] Well, I have set up a hamachi network for us to talk on, but I cannot tell you the network name and password because it would be regarded as advertisement on forums and too many people would join it who arent even in the development team. So if your in it I will pm you pass and name. [center][u]Open Positions:[/u][/center] [b]Forum Designers:[/b] -(empty) -(empty) [b]CFG coders:[/b] [i]Theese positions are for people who can't code very well, but have good ideas for NPC's/items in the cfg files. You will have to edit autospawn.cfg , npc.cfg, item.cfg + shops.cfg.[/i] -ownz0r -(empty) -(empty) [b]Main JAVA coders:[/b] [i]For people with some Java knowledge. You will be editing: client.java, npchandler.java, itemspawnpoints.java, itemhandler.java, item(234).java... and so on... [/i] - ™Errør™ - si force - Tobias222 -(empty) - rs w00dcut -(empty) [b]Testers:[/b] - Noob only -(empty) -(empty) [center][u]The Form:[/u][/center] Please full this out truthfully. [code] Desired spot: [] CFG [] JAVA How many days a week can you be online, for how long? Have you ever participated in any other projects, if yes, please post a quote below of what your last admin said about you:
[/code]

item.title: Tobias's Final Server! (development team)
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Man it really stinks your leaving cause you were a great help, but there are more experienced people for all of those options to sign up for. Hope to see you from time to time ~
Thank you man, that means a lot to me, I would love to have you in my last server, why not? Mabye a cfg coder your not that bad...
Desired spot: CFG, I don't know how good or bad I am at coding. I'll try CFG first. How many days a week can you be online, for how long? Hm, I think I can be on every day for like 1 hour or more. Have you ever participated in any other projects, if yes, please post a quote below of what your last admin said about you: I didn't work on any other projects. Reason for interest: I'd like to be in a project, never been in one. Age: 13. (If you would like to know.) And I might speak bad English, because I am Dutch.

Finally, your ACCEPTED, I need some cfg coders and thank you .

Position wanted: Tester Reason for interest: I just want to see how it goes

Accepted. Great to have a fan of the server.
I will add a new section for testers!

Thanks everyone, can’t wait to start working on this…

Read full topic

item.title: Tobias's Final Server! (development team)
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

Yes you read correctly , this is my last server… ever! I might still come on moparscape from time to time to help people with their errors as I have been doing for the past few months. So I decided if im going to leave, I might as well make one final server. If ive ever helped you or you know me or you would simply like to help with my last server, please join! The name has not been decided yet, but hopefully we will think of one soon!
[center]You may think “CLASS! Tobias’s final server, its gonna be great, too bad he wont want me in the team >.<” Thats not true, no matter how skilled you are I want you. Please dont think that. I want this to be a community project. not a “people good at servers only” project. I will enjoy leaving mopar knowing I taught at least a few people while developing my last server. I thought it was important for you to know this.[/center]
[center]How I plan to talk to everyone:[/center]
Well, I have set up a hamachi network for us to talk on, but I cannot tell you the network name and password because it would be regarded as advertisement on forums and too many people would join it who arent even in the development team. So if your in it I will pm you pass and name.
[center]Open Positions:[/center]
Forum Designers:
-(empty)
-(empty)

CFG coders:
Theese positions are for people who can’t code very well, but have good ideas for NPC’s/items in the cfg files.
You will have to edit autospawn.cfg , npc.cfg, item.cfg + shops.cfg.
-ownz0r
-(empty)
-(empty)

Main JAVA coders:
For people with some Java knowledge. You will be editing: client.java, npchandler.java, itemspawnpoints.java, itemhandler.java, item(234).java… and so on…

  • ™Errør™
  • si force
  • Tobias222
    -(empty)
  • rs w00dcut
    -(empty)

Testers:

  • Noob only
    -(empty)
    -(empty)

[center]The Form:[/center]
Please full this out truthfully.

[] CFG
[] JAVA
How many days a week can you be online, for how long?
Have you ever participated in any other projects, if yes, please post a quote below of what
your last admin said about you:
